channel.title: NLTK on Nishadh KA
channel.description: Recent content in NLTK on Nishadh KA

item.title: Find the tense and voices in a sentence by English grammar checker
item.description: Search made to find various type of tense in a sentence. Ended in this, page. Stanford core NLP and NLTK with python are good natural language processors used for this purposes. NLP gives a statistical measure of the possible role of words in a sentence, Standford NLP is giving a web service with visualization of various statical measures in part-of-speech tags. Its grammatical state is inferred using the Penn tags, yes machine based!
